Detailed Description

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ImageSource.ConfirmDialog.ConfirmDialog (  )

A confirm dialog to be presented to the user. Default strings are used for all fields.

ImageSource.ConfirmDialog.ConfirmDialog ( string  yes,
string  no,
string  prompt,
string  title,
EventHandler< EventArgs >  yesHandler,
EventHandler< EventArgs >  noHandler 
)

A confirm dialog to be presented to the user. Custom strings are used for all fields. Additionally, custom handlers for the 'Yes' and 'No' answer buttons can be supplied.

Parameters:
yesThe text to appear on the 'Yes' answer button
noThe text to appear on the 'No' answer button
promptThe text to appear as a prompt for the user to confirm
titleThe text to appear as title to the window
yesHandlerThe handler to run when the 'Yes' answer button is pressed.
noHandlerThe handler to run when the 'No' answer button is pressed.
